{% extends "templates/end_page.html" %} {% set namespaces = "cmoon::meta" %} {% set library_name = "Metaprogramming" %} {% set item_name = "type_list" %} {% set end_name = "index" %} {% set templates = "" %} {% block content2 %} {{macros.overload_set([ " template [[nodiscard]] static constexpr index_type index() noexcept; " ])}}

Returns the index of type T. Any program calling index() with a type T that is not in the type_list is ill-formed.

{{macros.function_stats( [], "The index of type T from the type_list.", "This function never throws exceptions", "Constant." )}} {{macros.example_code( " import cmoon.meta; int main() { using tl = cmoon::meta::type_list; static_assert(tl::index() == 2); } " )}} {% endblock %}
